main event: A bright star-like object was observed rotating in the sky over the oil town of Seria, Borneo, emitting twin jets of vapor.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be at a height of 30,000 feet., The sighting lasted for about 40 minutes., Hundreds of spectators witnessed the event and referred to it as a 'Flying Saucer'., Similar phenomena have been reported over Borneo several times recently., The observation has been labeled as insufficient data for evaluation.
